Procedure Summary
::::decideFrameRate { {portSpeed 100} {frameSize 64} {percentage 100} }

################################################################# Procedure Name: decideFrameRate Description: Decide the ixia frame rate based on the given portSpeed, FrameSize, & percentage bandwidth Input args: {portSpeed} {frameSize} {percentage} Output args: none Typical usage: set frameRate [decideFrameRate $txSpeed $frameSize $percentage] Category: Utility #################################################################

::::decideLoopCount { numFrames streamType }

################################################################# Procedure Name: decideLoopCount Description: Decides the loopCount if numFrames > 16Mil due to ixia bug Input args: {portSpeed} {frameSize} {frameRate} Output args: none Typical usage: decideLoopCount $numFrames $streamType Category: Utility #################################################################

::::decidePercentage { {portSpeed 100} {frameSize 64} {frameRate default} }

################################################################# Procedure Name: decidePercentage Description: Decide the ixia percentage given portSpeed, FrameSize, & frameRate Input args: {portSpeed} {frameSize} {frameRate} Output args: none Typical usage: set percentage [decidePercentage $txSpeed $frameSize $frameRate] Category: Utility #################################################################

::::findNumPortPerIxiaCard { {cardNum 1} }

::::getIxiaPortType { ixPort }
